name: addons
description: Addons to the Masterportal of Landesbetrieb Geoinformation und Vermessung Freie und Hansestadt Hamburg

hooks.pre-push: cd .. && node ./node_modules/@masterportal/mpconfigparser/cli.js ./doc/config.json.md ./doc/config.json.de.md && eslint --max-warnings 0 "./**/*.{vue,js}" && npm run buildJsDoc && npm run test:all && cd addons
